availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Zerelda O'Rear Dean. Father of Mary E. Dean and Nancy Jane Dean. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1850. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860, including John [Unknown] and Louisa [Unknown].

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 72B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, p. 77A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994049, Montgomery County Births.
"Zerelda Dean (1812-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial 120498347, accessed September 30, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/120498347.
